ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Sam, Welcome to EQ and the EQ_Rainbow. The largest family guild is the Mystic Alliance on Rodcet Nife server. I think there is also a group of bears on
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Sam,

Welcome to EQ and the EQ_Rainbow. The largest 'family' guild is the Mystic
Alliance on Rodcet Nife server. I think there is also a group of bears on
another server and the Nameless Love guild on the Nameless server.

We'd love to have you join us on Rodcet Nife and I'm sure the other guilds
would welcome you too.

David
Kerik Rainbow, 45 Druid
Jono Rainbow, 23 Warrior

----- Original Message -----
From: <s_garmon@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 6:51 AM
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Hello


> Hello,
>
> I'm a new (as in 1st lvl!) player on the Tholuxe Paells Server. Just
> found this list today! Very interested to group with other glbt
> players. Anybody on the list play on my server, or is there a special
> server that this groups uses?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Sam.
>
>
>
>
>
